bgu.dcr.az.api.prob

Class Problem

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgu.dcr.az.api.prob.Problem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImmutableProblem

    public class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImmutableProblem
    An abstract class for problems that should let you build any type of problem

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  Problem.ImmutableSetOfIntegers
      this class is required to allow array of this type as java cannot create an array of generic types and we want to avoid uneccecery casting

      • initialize

        public void initialize(ProblemType type,
              java.util.List<? extends java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> domains)
        initialize the problem with multiple domains the number of variables is the domain.size()
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the problem
        domains - list of domains for each agent - this list also determines the number of variables that will be domains.size

        numberOfVariables - number of variables in this problem
        domain - the domain for all the variables.
